name: Angara.com
tag_list: jewelry, rings, earrings, pendants, necklaces, bands, gemstone-jewelry, diamond-rings, diamond-jewelry, diamond-earrings, sapphire-rings, sapphire-engagement-rings, diamond-studs, diamond-pendants, baby-jewelry, moms-rings, mother-jewelry, birthstone-jewe
overview:
Angara.com is The Gemstone Destination.

Angara offers an incredible selection of gemstones and gemstone jewelry, specializing in Sapphires, Rubies, Emeralds, Tanzanites, Aquamarines and Diamonds. Our team of designers work closely with our gemstone supply team to ensure that we offer beautiful designs for every occasion and budget. If you don’t see exactly what you are looking for, simply give us a call at 1-888-926-4272 and one of our Personal Jewelers will be happy to create a custom-made piece for you!

For generations, the founders of Angara have been a crucial part of the jewelry industry, with deep roots in fine gemstone cutting, polishing and design. In fact, many of the most incredible Rubies, Sapphires, Emeralds, Tanzanites and Aquamarines through history have come from the founders of Angara. Take a walk through any of our offices around the world and you’ll see photos of royalty and celebrities from the last century who traveled far and wide to get their beautiful pieces of fine gemstone jewelry from these founders!
